msbt.message: Mmm Can't you just feel the tension in the air? A whole new year is about to begin! I can't WAIT to forget what year it is for a whole month, .
Well, the year is about to exit stage left.The question iswill next year be an encore? Or will we reboot with new talent? Ooh, what I wouldn't give to be on the wall in the writers' room
There's less than an hour left in , .Quick! Do or undo all of the things you're going to regret doing or not doing!
Hey. You did great this year. From to , you rocked it.
Nice hat, . Ha HA! Have you seen mine?Live it up! Get crazy! It's our last chance to wear hats this year!
Waiting for the Countdown is like waiting for to cool before taking a bite. I like to live dangerouslyand with a perpetually burned mouth.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! We can't start the Countdown unless you're wearing the special hat! Quick! You gotta go find one or we might be stuck in forever!
Not a hat person, huh?Well, I've got a resolution idea for you Resolve to become a hat person pronto, !
Well, you're all ready for the Countdown, aren't you?I put on my Countdown hat like I arrive at parties Fashionably late.
Well, look who's on the cutting edge of Countdown fashion!Can't let you outdress me, . Ha HA!
Now we're ready for the new year. Giddyup, !
Forgetting something? I'll give you a hintâ€”it rhymes with "cat," and you put it on your head. And before you say it, the answer is not cat, !
Hat time! Check me out!
Now we can get the party started, !What are you waiting for? Throw on your hat and join me for the Countdown, !
Hear that? It's the sound of the new year approaching, wearing tap shoes.
We have less than 30 minutes left in the year. And I still haven't accomplished all of my goals! Quick! Sign my band to a record deal and give me an advance on my novel!
The grand finale is almost here! If you've got any last-minute dance moves, now's the time to show off.
The moment you put your special Countdown hat on, you entered party mode. But be careful! Save some party for the actual event, .
Just when I thought I was the most dashing around here YOU show up. Oh, wait. You're not at all! It's still me, !
So, how do I look in my Countdown hat? Dashing? Handsome? Like a plate of fresh ? Sorry, I'm a little hungry. It's late!
You know this is the only day of the year you can get away with that hat, right? So what are you waiting for? Put it on and let's party!
Congratulations. You just got invited to my hat-release party. It's very exclusive. And it beginsNOW!
Whoa, your hat just reminded me of something important. MY hat!Yeesh. Good thing we ran into each other. Starting a new year hatless is bad luck.
NowI'm ready to PARTY!
I feel like we're underdressed for this celebration somehowAh HA! I've got just the thing. Follow my lead, !
What's that saying? Great minds both forget to wear their hats?
That's more like it. Now I'm dressed to the elevens and ready to count down some numbers! What are you waiting for? Toss that chapeau on your head and join me, !
It's almost here I'm freaking out! It's like I'm champ before a big tourney
It's almost here Don't blink or you'll miss the magic moment, !
Less than five.<10_4 /> Minutes.<10_4 /> Left.Of course, with all this buildup, it's going to feel like a lot longer than that! Ha HA!
C'mon! Let's go greet the new year with a fist bump and a twirl.<10_7 arg="120" />
, there's only one minute left! The new year is, like, two product placements away!<10_7 arg="120" />
Less than an hour left in the yearMaybe I'll just sit out the Countdown festivities this time and do something life affirming instead. You know, like .
What should I do with the very last hour in , I'm already hanging out with you! Nothing could be a better use of my time.
I guess it's FINE that I wasn't invited to an exclusive after-party or fragrance launch tonight As long as you're here, this is the most exclusive party around. Ha HA!
It's almost here. IT'S ALMOST HERE!I'm not even partying yet and my heart is beating beat!It kinda sounds likeBOOM! HAH! BOOYAH!Should I get that checked out?
Ahh, nothing like ringing in the new year in a quiet place, away from all the noise and chaos. Ha HA! Had you going, didn't I? I'm just charging up for a big dance number at midnight, !
I honestly believe that the very last thing you do in a year sets the tone for the following year. So will you give me a standing ovation at midnight while I tap-dance and read beat poetry?
Let's really go for it next year, OK? And the year after that too!We'll take a short break from going for it the year after that, but then the year after THAT? Back at it!
Only a few minutes left Let's get ready to say "wazzzzup" to the new year!
I really couldn't have picked a better person to spend the last moments of the year with, . I just wish the paparazzi could be here now to see how touching this moment is
You ready, ?<10_7 arg="120" />
There's no turning back now!<10_7 arg="120" />
It's here. We're living it. ! The Year of !<10_4 /> And , of course
Look at those fireworks ringing in the new yearWe're officially living in the future!
This moment right now will always be my defining memory of Unless this is finally the year my band takes off.
Here's to another banner year on for us all!I hope we make the shortlist at the Island Awards. And that the Island Awards are a thing that exist.
Oh, , those fireworks were so goodYou think they'd let me shoot some off every time I say something cool?
I know today is just another day, but it really feels like a fresh start, you know?
What's your dream for this new year, ?I just want it to be better than last year in every possible way. Is that too much to ask?
I wonder what new folks we'll meet this yearIf I meet anyone halfway as cool as you, I'll be twice as surprised as I was at my surprise party. Don't check my math.

That's it! is here! I can tell because of the fireworks.And I can tell that the fireworks are going off by using my ears. Ahhthey sound beautiful. Go onâ€”take a look! A real fireworks connoisseur like me doesn't need to use his EYES to appreciate them.
Welcome to , !
This is the year I finally come out of my shell and start being true to the real ! Ha HA! You can't tell whether or not I'm joking, can you?
Life is like . The more you practice, the better it gets. And let me tell you, is going to be the YEAR of !
I really want to savor this moment, you know? So I'm just gonna stay up all night. Stick around if you want to see what happens!
Those fireworks really got my brain buzzing I don't think sleep is in the cards tonight. Or is it today? <10_4 />Don't know, don't care. It's a new year, I'm never gonna sleep again!
Why am I awake? Well, I've stayed up this longâ€”might as well keep the party rolling! There will be plenty of time for sleep when I'm sleepy, !
The year changes over so quickly, it's almost like nothing happened.But! I assure you that the is new and improved. Ha HA!
